extensionDescription.message: Add Cantonese pronunciation (Jyutping) on Chinese characters, using tone marks instead of numbers.

popupCheckboxText.message: Inject automatically（<ruby class="inject-jyutping">自<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">zị</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">動<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">dụng</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">注<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">zyu</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby><ruby class="inject-jyutping">入<rp>(</rp><rt lang="yue-Latn">jạp</rt><rp>)</rp></ruby>）

refreshPromptText.message: Please refresh the page for the change to take effect.
